Text: Clarification on Business Practices Posting of CORRESPONDENTS WESTERN MARKET INTERFACE COMMITTEE COMPLIANCE PROCESS TASK FORCE OPERATIONS COMMITTEE AND OC SUBCOMMITTEES PLANNING COORDINATION COMMITTEE AND PCC SUBCOMMITTEES This is to provide clarification of the earlier message announcing the posting of Majority Accepted BP for WSCC New DP containing only Practices and The full list of Business Practices with only BP modified from the earlier version was posted for comment on August We received very few comments over the next days At its October meeting the OC agreed to have these two business practices posted for an additional days as only one comment was received relative to BP Other comments were related to items already approved by ISAS and OC vote Business Practice is being offered for Due Process as requested by the OC due to an OC members request that WSCC become more consistent with NERC Policy and the Eastern Interconnection Hence the OC and ISAS Chairs are requesting comments about leaving in the WSCC Business Practices or removing it all together Bill Comish Ph Fax
